verbs.description: [ARG0: permanent camera] [V: allows] [ARG1: denver police to scan license plates the denver police department is expanding its use of technology with] the goal of catching violent criminals faster the city installed its first permanent license plate reader at west sixth avenue and federal boulevard federal denver police department ron thomas denver
